videoSummary.title: Elli AvrRam Explores The Land Of Buddha, Bodhgaya | India With Elli Season 02 | EP 09 | Curly Tales
videoSummary.description: In this episode of India With Elli Season 2, Elli guides you through the awe-inspiring Mahabodhi Temple Complex, a UNESCO World Heritage site and the heart of Buddhism. Marvel at the intricate details of the temple, a testament to Bodhgaya's spiritual significance.

videoSummary.title: Elli AvrRam Explores Land of the Kings - Rajgir | India With Elli S2 | EP 08 | Curly Tales
videoSummary.description: In this episode of India With Elli Season 02, Elli AvrRam delves into the rich historical treasures of Rajgir.
